Detailed Description

Sequence extension for maxMSP's external.

bool pizSequenceResizeTempZone ( PIZSequence *  x,
const PIZCoordinates *  c,
PIZDataIndex  side 
)

Resize the temporary zone with a PIZCoordinates.

Use PIZ_DATA_START, PIZ_DATA_END, PIZ_DATA_UP or PIZ_DATA_DOWN to indicate the side to change.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
c The Coordinates.
side The side to set.
Returns:
True if something changed, otherwise false.

long  pitch,
long  position 
)

Move the temporary zone with delta values.

The temporary zone is snapped to the grid.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.

Returns:

long pizSequenceSelectNoteWithCoordinates ( PIZSequence *  x,
const PIZCoordinates *  c 
)

Given coordinates, select and mark the first note matched.

All notes are unselected except the note found.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
c A coordinates as PIZCoordinates.
Returns:
True if note matched, otherwise false.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
c A coordinates as PIZCoordinates.
Returns:

)

Select notes with lasso.

Parameters:
x A valid pointer.
m The first PIZCoordinates.
n The second PIZCoordinates.

Returns:

Add a note with PIZCoordinates.

Default values are provided to the new note ; duration is set with noteValue or grid attribute.
